title: kaNNAlE karuNai
sahitya:
kaNNAlE karuNai pkarumukhil annrO paNNAri varuvOrkkup-palanum kaimEl anrO


anupallavi

  eNNAda nilayennum emmiDattil uNDO iNaiyAna deivamonrum ivvulagil uNDO


caraNam 1    paNNAlE isai kUTTip-pADAda nAvuNDO pArkkumiDam engaNumE paravi nirppaL anrO
puNNAna tuyar tanaiyE pOkkubavaL anrO porAda tuNaiyAgap-poliyavaL anrO
    caraNam 2    anjAda nila tannai aruLbavaL anrO amararellAm avaLiDattil aDimaigaL anrO
aravaNaittuk-kAkkinra annaiyavaL anrO arasiyAga akhilattai AlbavaL anrO
    caraNam 3    vandArkku varam nalgum vAridhiyanrO cintaiyilE magizhvETrum sIr nidhiyanrO
swundaramAi agam niraiyum suguNavati anrO mantirangaL marai pugazhum mAriyavaL anrO
